component.name: wxEDID
component.summary: Read and edit Extended Display Identification Data (EDID) files

description.p: wxEDID is a wxWidgets - based EDID (Extended Display Identification Data) editor.
This is an early stage of development, allowing to modify the base EDID v1.3+ structure and CEA/CTA-861-G (as first extension block).

Besides normal editor functionality, the app has been equipped with a DTD constructor, which aims to ease timings selection/editing. It's also possible to export and import EDID data to/from text files (hex ASCII format) and also to export the structures as a human-readable text.
